ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who are watchful of their acts of prayer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who strictly guard their Salawat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who keep a guard on their prayers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And who pay heed to their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those who attend to their prayers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who of their prayers are observant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and are watchful of their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who strictly guard their (five compulsory congregational) Salawat (prayers) (at their fixed stated hours).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and those who observe their prayers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:9] And who are watchful of their prayers (may be read as plural, salawātihim, ‘their prayers’, or singular, salātihim, ‘their prayer’) observing them at their appointed times.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And who pay heed to their prayers) pay attention to the prescribed times of their prayers.
